timeline.message:
Refactor genJMethodForBFunc method of JvmMethodGen

Related issue https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/25252

timeline.bodyText: Can we change the class name to something like JvmCodegenUtil ? I think it's more understandable.
timeline.author: HindujaB

timeline.bodyText:
Is this indentation correct? I checked with WSO2 checkstyle it was like this.
                this.mv.visitMethodInsn(INVOKESTATIC, BAL_ERRORS, "createInteropError",
                        String.format("(L%s;)L%s;", THROWABLE, ERROR_VALUE), false);
Same happens in many other places.
timeline.author: HindujaB

replies.bodyText: It is about where we put the new line and then formatter does the rest 🙂
replies.author: riyafa

timeline.bodyText: This class in not needed as discussed during the review. We can directly access all these variables without null checks now.
timeline.author: Kishanthan
